[00:00.00]lovely (ラブリー) - Billie Eilish/Khalid
[00:01.82]Lyrics by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell/Khalid Robinson
[00:03.65]Composed by：Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell/Khalid Robinson
[00:05.48]Billie Eilish/Khalid：
[00:06.22]
[00:21.02]Thought I found a way
[00:22.61]
[00:25.11]Thought I found a way out
[00:27.31]Found
[00:29.02]But you never go away
[00:31.41]Never go away
[00:33.04]So I guess I gotta stay now
[00:36.26]Oh I hope some day I'll make it out of here
[00:44.34]Even if it takes all night or a hundred years
[00:52.81]Need a place to hide but I can't find one near
[01:01.02]Wanna feel alive outside I can't fight my fear
[01:10.13]
[01:11.13]Isn't it lovely all alone
[01:15.26]Heart made of glass my mind of stone
[01:19.45]Tear me to pieces skin to bone
[01:23.14]
[01:24.17]Hello welcome home
[01:28.28]Khalid/Billie Eilish：
[01:28.93]
[01:31.97]Walking out of time
[01:34.02]
[01:36.05]Looking for a better place
[01:38.18]Looking for a better place
[01:40.33]Something's on my mind
[01:42.01]
[01:44.46]Always in my head space
[01:46.53]Billie Eilish/Khalid：
[01:47.12]But I know someday I'll make it out of here
[01:55.40]Even if it takes all night or a hundred years
[02:03.73]Need a place to hide but I can't find one near
[02:12.13]Wanna feel alive outside I can't fight my fear
[02:20.85]
[02:22.17]Isn't it lovely all alone
[02:25.61]
[02:26.15]Heart made of glass my mind of stone
[02:30.27]Tear me to pieces skin to bone
[02:34.05]
[02:35.09]Hello welcome home

[02:39.65]
[02:41.12]Woah yeah
[02:47.27]Yeah ah
